indicator_name: Number of countries developing, adopting or implementing policy instruments aimed at supporting the shift to sustainable consumption and production
target_name: Den Zehnjahres-Programmrahmen für nachhaltige Konsum- und Produktionsmuster umsetzen, wobei alle Länder, an der Spitze die entwickelten Länder, Maßnahmen ergreifen, unter Berücksichtigung des Entwicklungsstands und der Kapazitäten der Entwicklungsländer
un_designated_tier: Tier II
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
page_content:
Exploring data sources 
Suitable data sources for this indicator are currently being explored. This indicator is classified as Tier 3 and therefore no internationally established methodology or statistical standards are yet available. Corresponding methodologies or standards are being developed by the responsible international organizations and subsequently tested in cooperation with national statistical offices. If you have any feedback or suggestions on data please contact us through the contact form below.
target: Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries
